data.description: List of data to be plotted as character values specifyingmultiple bigwig file paths, dataframes in BED format, or\link[GenomicRanges]{GRanges} objects with metadata column \code{score}

binSize.description: A numeric specifying the length of each databin in basepairs

binCap.description: A logical value indicating whether the function willlimit the number of data bins to 8,000

negData.description: A logical value indicating whether any of the data has bothpositive and negative scores and the y-axis of each signal trackshould be split

chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

linecolor.description: A character value or vector of character values specifyingthe line color(s) outlining the signal tracks

fill.description: A character value or vector specifyingthe fill color(s) of the signal tracks

ymax.description: A numeric specifying the fraction of the max y-valueto set as the height of each plot

range.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the y-rangeof data to plot (c(min, max)) in each signal track

scale.description: A logical value indicating whether to include a datascale label in the top left corner of each plot

label.description: An optional character vector to conveniently add text labelsto signal tracks

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

baseline.description: A logical value indicating whether to include abaseline along the x-axis

orientation.description: A string specifying signal track orientations

x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying the overall multisignalx-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying overall multisignal plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying overall multisignal plotwidth

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying overall multisignal plotheight

just.description: A string specifying the justification of overall multisignal plot relative toits (x, y) location

gapdistance.description: A numeric or unit objectspecifying space between plots

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
